title: Cousin Natasha's Rice & Bean Salad
directions: Wash and prepare all the vegetables and place them and the other ingredients in a medium bowl. Stir together well and chill before serving. Makes 4-6 servings.
ingredients: 2 cups cooked black, or kidney beans
2 T red wine vinegar (we used white wine vinegar)
dash of hot sauce (we used saracha) sp?)
